messages.400: *waves hand* Your request was malformed. These aren't the parameters the server is looking for.
messages.401: *waves hand* You don't have authorization. These aren't the credentials you need.
messages.402: *waves hand* Payment is required to access this. These aren't the free resources you're looking for.
messages.403: *waves hand* Access is forbidden. You don't need to see this restricted area.
messages.404: *waves hand* You don't need to see this page. The URL you seek does not exist here.
messages.405: *waves hand* That HTTP method won't work here. These aren't the verbs you're looking for.
messages.406: *waves hand* The format you requested isn't available. This isn't the content type you're looking for.
messages.408: *waves hand* The request took too long. This isn't the timely response you're looking for.
messages.409: *waves hand* There's a conflict in the data. This isn't the synchronized state you're looking for.
messages.410: *waves hand* This content is gone forever. These aren't the pages that exist anymore.
messages.413: *waves hand* Your upload is too large. This isn't the file size the server accepts.
messages.429: *waves hand* You're making too many requests. This isn't the rate limit you wanted.
messages.500: *waves hand* The server encountered an error. This isn't the working server you're looking for.
messages.502: *waves hand* The gateway failed. This isn't the connection path you're looking for.
messages.503: *waves hand* The service is unavailable. This isn't the online server you're looking for.
messages.504: *waves hand* The gateway timed out. This isn't the fast connection you're looking for.
messages.default: *waves hand* You don't need to see this page.

descriptions.400: You can fix your request syntax. Move along.
descriptions.401: You can go get proper credentials. Move along.
descriptions.402: You can find the payment portal. Move along.
descriptions.403: You can request access from an admin. Move along.
descriptions.404: You can go about your business. Move along.
descriptions.405: You can try a different HTTP method. Move along.
descriptions.406: You can adjust your Accept headers. Move along.
descriptions.408: You can retry with a faster connection. Move along.
descriptions.409: You can resolve the conflict and retry. Move along.
descriptions.410: You can search for alternate content. Move along.
descriptions.413: You can reduce your file size. Move along.
descriptions.429: You can slow down your requests. Move along.
descriptions.500: You can wait for the server to recover. Move along.
descriptions.502: You can try a different gateway route. Move along.
descriptions.503: You can come back when service resumes. Move along.
descriptions.504: You can retry when the gateway responds. Move along.
descriptions.default: You can go about your business. Move along.
